website_summaries.verdict: Moving from mother’s milk to solid food is difficult enough without worrying about potential digestive issues down the road, but this comprehensive supplement goes a long way to establish a healthy digestive system.
pros: Includes probiotics and prebiotics to help craft a strong digestive system from an early age
cons: This supplement is made with grains and soy

customer_reviews.title: Fixed our cat's poop and litterbox issues
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats was having problems with very loose, smelly stool, and she had stopped using the litterbox, preferring instead to go on the tile floor next to the box, possibly because the loose stools made the litter uncomfortable and messy for her. We tried various fixes, and none worked. We started giving her these probiotics, and within a week, her problems disappeared. One note: None of our three cats will eat these probiotics straight. They walk away after sniffing them. My solution was to break the chew into small pieces and feed them to the cat with a little tuna.
customer_reviews.author: John Cochran

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: These actually help a bit
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really noticed a difference. It actually made one of our cats have stinkier poop. UPDATE: Ok. It’s so weird how these have different effects on our two cats. Our cat that used to have the stinkiest poop every now does not stink. Our cat that didn’t stink before, now has stinky poop... BUT she had issues keeping food down before. These have helped her eat more. Both cats don’t throw up as often now. So.. ordering these again. Definitely give them a full month before writing them off.
customer_reviews.author: Sumati

customer_reviews.title: Helped my senior cat...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first probiotic that I have ever given to my senior cat - she's at least 14yrs old. So...anyone who has cats knows that scoots and rouge poops outside the box can be an issue. Our oldest female cat was doing this more frequently so I decided to see if a probiotic would help. I must say that after about 3 weeks, I haven't see any scoots or rouge poops - yay!!! She seems to love the flavor and hangs out near the bag as if to want more. She even seems to have a bit more energy now too. I would definitely recommend giving this a try for older cats and/or those with tummy issues.
customer_reviews.author: EKR0225

customer_reviews.title: Definite Improvement in Cat's Health
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a powder probiotic that was okay but too expensive to give every day; I also didn't like the powder formulation. I decided to try these for my geriatric cat (16.5 years) with digestive issues [frequent vomiting (1-2 times per day), occasional diarrhea] so I could give him a daily probiotic. Within a week of starting these, there was noticeable decrease in vomiting. Three weeks later, he rarely vomits at all and I just ordered another pack. With regards to the taste, my old man cat is a very picky eater and he really likes these. I highly recommend owners of cats with digestive issues give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Toni H

customer_reviews.title: Good for kitties >^•^<
customer_reviews.text: Good product for kitties with tummy problems. Probiotic support is essential for all pets that suffer from intestinal troubles, this one, this brand (which I've used for many years) is one I trust to do the job. I find that my cats respond quite well after about 3 days of taking them, and fortunately they come as tasty chews so it isn't a fight to get them to eat what they need. I highly recommend these, and this brand in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci WolfCat

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This has worked very well for my cat. His constipation has resolved itself, he looks good and feels good. The company is excellent to deal with, great customer service. I have had no problems with him eating this every day for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous to cats. Making my cats have bloody diarrhea. The citric acid is very harmful to cats!!! Thought was helping her digestive system and ended up at vet's office😥
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Less Cat Puke Is A Good Thing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps my cat have less vomiting. Before using these she frequently vomited, sometimes every day, whatever kind of food she had. With a daily dose of these probiotic treats, her vomit frequency is much reduced. NOTE: These treats do dry out easily and she won't eat them once they do. The pouch does not seem to close tightly enough (or, we weren't sealing it completely). I now immediately take them out of the pouch and put them in a tightly sealed glass jar. Now they stay fresh enough that we can get through the whole package.
customer_reviews.author: Dana W.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Help
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression it would help lessen my cat's diarrhea but it didn't. It even counteracts the anti-diarrhea medicine that was helping him with it. so I'm very disappointed in this product. My cat's been going now more than before taking it. It's all over my floor and I can't clean it up fast enough cause he can't make it to the litter box. So, I'm no longer going to give him this and hoping the effects aren't long term. Money wasted in my opinion. I wish I'd put the money I spent here toward more anti-diarrhea medicine that was helping.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for your feline!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been giving a couple of my cats this product for a while now and I feel good knowing they’ve stayed healthy having this as a daily treat. The treat itself is a bit large so I tend to break it in half as both of my cats have some teeth missing at this stage in their lives but they have no problem taking it daily. VetriScience is a good company with many valuable products to offer your pet and I trust their products.
customer_reviews.author: T.N.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, quickly harden
customer_reviews.text: Well, the jury is still out on these. My feline loved these when I first opened them up. No matter how quickly you close the bag and letting the air they get dry at which point he turned his nose up at them. I've been breaking them up into little pieces and mixing with his wet food. I honestly haven't noticed any difference but he had none, to begin with. Giving a daily probiotic is beneficial in any case.
customer_reviews.author: dansb2

customer_reviews.title: Ingredient not all listed
customer_reviews.text: Includes silicone dioxide which is controversial as to its safety due to nano particles.I would not eat it and I won’t give it to my cats.It was not listed on the product ingredient description above.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Helped Kitty with GI Issues
customer_reviews.text: We have a 12-year-old kitty with severe GI issues causing daily vomiting. We switched to a special vet formula diet (many different kinds) that failed to help and have had to administer cerenia injections every 3 days. After trying these probiotics, she has done tremendously better and her appetite has improved. We've only had to give her one injection the past two weeks. Give them a try and see if they work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Nash

customer_reviews.title: Over the 1st hump - they like the taste!
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics have made a difference in our lives so was surprised to see probiotics for cats. Had one that was not feeling so good for a week. He seemed to perk right up after giving him these. Will continue with both cats who are only 3 and 4 as we feel probiotics keep our immune system strong and we rarely pick up colds and the like. Feel that these will help keep our cats strong too. Have tried other hairball remedies that they wouldn't take so was relieved that they went right for these probiotic treats like they were a great!!
customer_reviews.author: Renowriter

customer_reviews.title: My cats don't like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my three older cats were exposed to panleukemia. I bought it to help their immune and digestive system. I was giving them anything that I could think of to fight off this deadly virus. They would smell it and then turn their noses up at it. I literally had to break them up into 5 smaller pieces and force feed them. I think that the ingredients are great and it probably helped them survive, but they did not like the smell or taste of them at all . I have tried a few times just setting it down by them - they will lick it and then look at me like - "I don't think so"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy probiotics
customer_reviews.text: There are so many options for probiotics for pets. However, it isn't always easy to find one that is palatable for a fussy cat. VetriScience Labs probiotic everyday for cats fit the bill nicely. Whether or not this helps the gut flora is difficult to determine. Our senior cats eat very lean novel meat diets that's devoid of preservatives and unhealthy chemicals. Their GI tracts need a little extra fibre and probiotics to keep everything moving along nicely so they remain healthy. This probiotic likely is suitable for what we're trying to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terrible, but She LOVES
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was concerned my picky cat would not like these treats. Yes, they smell absolutely terrible, but she basically inhaled it then looked at me for more (the package only recommends 1 a day, though). The antibiotics she is on have been hurting her stomach quite badly. However, after only about 2 days, I noticed a difference in her: less urgent trips to the litter box, and more willing to eat. Hopefully this keeps up! I will edit if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a Himalayan which turned 17 yrs old last November 1st. He is being treated for kidney disease. I took him to see the vet and he was constipated. They had to give him a enema. They represented Metamucil, with out favor or sugar. I could not find. Then they gave me something else to use, was kind of expensive. I tried everything and he would not take it. Hiding it in wet food, which he ate all the food and left the pill. The pill was a very hard plastic filled with liquid. I tried to squeeze the fluid out, but that was a miss. He chews this up every morning and it working great. Regular stools.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn A. Dossey

customer_reviews.title: Great for our EPI cat
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old EPI mess-of-a-cat loves these. We were spending a fortune on Purina Pro Forta-Flora, VetOne pancreplus, and Purina ProPlan Vet EN food and she still suffered terribly. So did I with all the clean up and hungry cat screams. THIS has been working better than the $30/month Forti-Flora. I also recommend ThomasLab BioCase over VetOne and find a grain free wet food such as Tiki Cat, Blue Freedom or Triumph beef for EPI cats.
customer_reviews.author: Cinobey6

customer_reviews.title: One of two cats like it
customer_reviews.text: I have two elderly cats, so I bought this to help their digestive issues. One cat liked it, one wouldn't eat it. I think the problem is that these are soft and big, unlike the smaller, crunchy treats they normally receive. I had to break them in half for the Siamese who ate them, but the other cat still wouldn't touch it. But I am learning that the healthier the food/treat/supplement that I try to give them, the less they like it. What can I say? My cats prefer junk food.
customer_reviews.author: ccsteveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bread brings back moisture
customer_reviews.text: My kitty seems happier and healthier now that she’s been on these probiotics. The reason for this review is to give a suggestion. Some of the reviews mentioned that they dry out, which I did experience. However, if you add a piece of bread to the bag, they moisten right up again. 😄. Keep in mind though that they will pull in flavor from the bread. Once they plumped back up, my kitty loved them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Must be helping 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat was diagnosed with IBD and the Rx from the vet made her just as sick if not worse than she was already so I switched to limited ingredient cat food and these probiotic treats. The vomiting is now almost non existent and she likes the taste of these “treats”
customer_reviews.author: BHunt

customer_reviews.title: 5 cats but only 1 will eat this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for one cat who has been having tummy issues. He ate one and then refused to eat anymore. I tried giving them to my other cats just to get rid of them and only one cat enjoys them. These things are ginormous so it takes her a while.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product, cats hated it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not giving this full stars because I have a multi-cat household and none of my cats liked it. I will say however, that I have added it to the wet food after breaking it down in water and it seemed to improved cats’ litter which was getting really smelly. Conclusion: it probably works as intended but the cats didn’t like it which makes it problematic to practically add to their food, especially in quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My finicky cat loves "her" treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't eat anything so I was a little concerned that she would not like the probiotic treats. She loved them!!!!!! She waits for her medicine every morning soon as she wakes up. She even tries to open the bag if she can get to it. The treat seems to be helping her digestive system. It took about a month to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Freida

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has had constant diarrhea since we got got him. We took him to the vet multiple times, they said he was fine. We switched his food multiple times. It felt like we were doing everything with nor results. Well, in come these things. My cat LOVES them. We give them to him after his breakfast and he thinks they're an extra treat for him. He's also finally taking solid poops, which makes me very happy! I HIGHLY recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: My cats will actually eat them
customer_reviews.text: My cats are very picky when it comes to new food, especially treats, but my pickiest cat actually comes running when I grab the bag. The treats are a bit chunky but easy to break if you need to (they are an adorable fish shape too). These are probiotic treats and I wanted them for a reason, that being said their poops have firmed up after they had gotten a bit loose from a food change. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, the best cat probiotic on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different probiotics for my cat, who wouldn't even touch them (usually a hard chewable pill), but she will eat this one - as long as we bride her with Temptation kitty treats! She had a bad gas problem and this has eliminated about 90% of it, so I'm very happy! Easy to chew too.
customer_reviews.author: jmw

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but good of kitty
customer_reviews.text: Personally I didn't like the smell but I'm not the one eating it. But my cat seem to like it. It's she first day on it so I will have to see how she does. They are kinda expensive but when you love your kitties and want her/him to be healthy you pay for it. And it cheaper then a vet bill.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Cat had bloody diarrhea for a long time. I put him on these. In a couple months the blood was gone. Diarrhea sometimes. He eat it willingly. He’s a big cat. Maybe he needs more than one to control the diarrhea. Not sure. He’s been on for 3 months and doing better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably a great product, but my cats did not like them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only rating these a 1 because my cats did not like them. Even my cat that will eat almost anything didn't like them. I so wanted my cats to enjoy these treats because I thought they would help my one cat that throws up all the time. Oh well...I'm sure this is a still a great product and can help kitties that will actually eat them!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great value, cats were not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in hopes that my cat with bowel issues would eat them to try and help. Unfortunately he will not touch them. Either he doesn't like the smell or they are too hard. Some of my other cats did eat them and they have to bite them into smaller pieces to begin eating them and it takes a while... one is 14 lbs so I would expect him to be able to gobble up most treats.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats it’s acid reflux
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was dealing with acid reflux. For a while the vet gave her a prescription and fancy cat food but that was too expensive to deal with. We started giving her these and ever since she’s started getting sick a lot less so I’d say they’re working - but have to be given regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Spencer Hammel

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes that my cat would actually eat these but it turns out that he loves them! He's been eating them for about a week now and already he seems to be feeling better. He's had issues with his stomach in the past but now that he's been eating these his stomach issues have slowed down significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Staci K

customer_reviews.title: Helps kitties of all ages
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I give these to a senior kitty and her bowel movements don’t smell as bad. I also give these to a younger kitty and she likes them. The kitties think they’re treats. The price is reasonable and seems to help the kitties. I have been buying these over and over.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: My cat didn't like it, never eat. But worked fine for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I trust this brand VetriScience, we've been purchasing and giving "Vetri Lysine Plus, 120 Bite-Sized Chews" to maintain the immune system. I wanted add this Probiotic, but my cat didn't like this, and refused to eat. Didn't want waste this, so I gave these to my dog that has sensitive stomach, worked fine for dog too.
customer_reviews.author: Happy888

customer_reviews.title: Work well. Not grain free.
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple of weeks, my cat was no longer constipated. I just wish they came in a grain free option. She has difficulty digesting grains. Her old grain filled food used to give her the runs. However, maybe these treats have just enough to help loosen things up because she seems okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rose

customer_reviews.title: Such a Difference
customer_reviews.text: My cat was throwing up her food daily and losing weight. Then light bulb went on. If my probiotics help me with my stomach problems why not my cat. After some research I chose this. What a difference. Since starting them two weeks ago my cat hasn't thrown up once and is gaining her weight back. Coat is healthy and she is more playful.
customer_reviews.author: BookFan

customer_reviews.title: This worked perfectly for him and he is keeping a good weight now
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a rare disease called micoplasma which causes him to have re-occuring lung infections. To prolong the times that he does not have a lung infection, our vet has prescribed a weekly antibiotic. I felt that this was making his stomach upset and set out to find a probiotic he would eat. This worked perfectly for him and he is keeping a good weight now. I am very happy with this product and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: To had for cat to chew
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these a good review but unfortunately these chews are too big for my cats mouth and they are so hard that even when i break them up into smaller pieces he couldn't eat them. He really wanted to so I know they must taste and smell good. Do to him not being able to eat them I can't review either on if they worked for his digestion. Will be looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: I bought this probiotic as a second option when my cat wouldn't eat the last probiotic I bought. I don't know how much probiotic is in one of these chewy treats. She loves them and begs for more. I'm happy that she likes them but I am not certain this will work as well as the much more expensive version (powder form) that I bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are quality and the kittens love them plus they help them maintain a healthy tummy ...
customer_reviews.text: We foster kittens and supplements can get expense. These are quality and the kittens love them plus they help them maintain a healthy tummy and immune system
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Foster Kittens

customer_reviews.title: Not my picky cat
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if my cat would eat them. I got them because he is 17 and throws up alot. Not sure why he won't eat them, but that's just my cat. Picky. If your cat isn't picky get them. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My cats didn't like them at all. Even my big 22 lb guy backed away from it. My dog wouldn't eat them either. I have no way of knowing if they work since due to their size and can't even force my cat to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11 year old cat. He was vomiting hair balls a few times a week and I was using hairball control, but it didn’t go away completely. I started using this and I think it helped with his gi issues a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tpassarini

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was having major gas issues that would stink up an entire floor of my two story town home. Took care of that issue and I had no issues with her eating these either!
customer_reviews.author: srh

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 4 cats say blech
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my 4 cats will eat these. Unfortunately the 2 that won't, are the ones that need them. I don't know if the product is actually any good or not since they obsoletely refuse it. It's cat's, what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington

customer_reviews.title: My male cat likes it alot.
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it and will eat if first when I feed him, whenever I give it to him. My cat is an American shorthair black and white male cat of about 6 years old. It helped him when he was biting himself until it bled when cleaning himself. This happened after we moved. It helped to heal him and he is a happy cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like these at our house!
customer_reviews.text: These have helped with my cat's vomiting issue. He has really chunked up after 5 years of being a skinny thing. They also must be tasty, because he thinks they are treats and begs for them...win, win. :)
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Cat won’t eat them
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to try these for my cat that has IBS. So much easier than mixing powder with soft food. Anyways she won’t touch them. I put them on the ground with a few other normal treats and she ate those but not these. Had to mash it up in some soft food to get her to at least eat half of it. Super disappointed since she’s not a picky eater what so ever and won’t eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalynandeevee

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I use them as treats and I have one cat who is picky and likes me to break it into smaller pieces but then eats it all. The other cat simply devours it. They aren't too smelly to me either.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a Great Product but my Kitten was over them in about 2 weeks. Can’t get him to eat them anymore. Seemed to help his gas & tummy. Only wish he would continue to take them! Fed 1 per day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat!
customer_reviews.text: Percy went berserk for these the minute I tore the top off the bag! His doctor recommended probiotics for GI upset from his medication. I’m so glad he’s willing to take these and actually looks forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: They are large and my chewy initially then get hard. The cats won't eat them hard, they chew on them a bit and give up. Seems to help stool when eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Quinlivan

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The kitties love them and it has been helping keep a healthy stool. Good quality product for the price! I would recommend these to any cat owner looking for a good probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Isabell

customer_reviews.title: No standards or bust
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics are probiotics they're gonna do their job. I got 2 cats one loves them the other one won't even swallow it if you try to shove it down her throat. That being said, if you have a cat that is a finicky eater they probably won't like these.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for delicate stomach
customer_reviews.text: My cat was suddenly getting diarrhea, with no change in diet and no underlying health issues. My vet said to try a probiotic, this has done the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Daun

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates them
customer_reviews.text: My cat wont eat these, I cant even break them into tiny pieces and hid in his cat food. He was used to the powder pre and probiotics which he never noticed.
customer_reviews.author: laynie D

customer_reviews.title: My cats did not like them.
customer_reviews.text: No idea if they work, all 5 of my cats thought they were gross. They would not eat them. Hard little cute fish shaped treats but apparently not tastey.
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I will buy this again and again. It’s cheaper to buy here than in store and it helps all of my cats from hair ball issues, bowel issues, among other things. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RedPandaDuck

customer_reviews.title: Very hard......
customer_reviews.text: My cats won't eat them and they are very hard. I even tried hiding them in a pill pocket and they still won't touch them. :( Loved the price, but other than that I guess my cats are picky eaters......
customer_reviews.author: Branda Schod

customer_reviews.title: kitten likes
customer_reviews.text: My shelter kitten had Giardia when I got him. I think this helped get him back to normal after extensive treatment and prescription food as well. He wouldn’t eat the powdered probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has helped minimize the cat puking that’s for sure. My cat was probably puking 2 to 3 times a week and since being on this has only puked maybe once in a month
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a good product from a company I trust.
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard review to write because I have an extremely picky cat. He ate them first thing in the morning for 3 days then walked away. The cat that doesn’t need them likes them.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: The boys seem to like them, 1 a night
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper to buy here than other places. The boys seem to like them, 1 a night, and it seems to have helped them, and me.
customer_reviews.author: ~MzShawnTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for your cats gut
customer_reviews.text: My long haired Mr. Kitty has a hard time with poop in his tail but these almost guarantee he has no loose stool. He's very selective about his treats but he loves these! Definitely a subscriber.
customer_reviews.author: AYonko

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat says no
customer_reviews.text: After two days my cat refused to eat them. Not sure what flavor it is. I can't find anything on the bag saying what it is. Will stick with powdered probiotics with more cultures as this only has one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Zero33

customer_reviews.title: A no thanks from my cats
customer_reviews.text: Out of 4 cats not one liked it or would even taste it They were real hard too. I wanted them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Dee

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, and it seems to have helped them a lot with their breathe and tummy issues. They love the taste too.
customer_reviews.author: MissMeah29

customer_reviews.title: Finicky cat
customer_reviews.text: If you have a smart cat, that knows whats going down, then dont buy this, as they wont eat it. Will eat treats, but not these, they just know.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't eat but one
customer_reviews.text: My cat ate only one and after that she wouldn't eat anymore. Cat didn't like it at all. I ended up tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: LikeCats2

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended a probiotic for 2 of my 3 cats. However, none of the 3 will eat this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic chews
customer_reviews.text: My cats had a hard time chewing them only because they are too big .I had to break them apart in half
customer_reviews.author: Jana Yelekci

customer_reviews.title: Helps her BMs
customer_reviews.text: My cat olive is pretty picky and wont eat wet food and only eats like 2 types of treats. She is so small I had to break these treats in 2 for her but after a bit of sniffing she ate it and her BMs are much more regular and not as stinky
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: No good at all.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Hard like dried play-doh. Cats won won't even eat them if I chop them up. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cats are finicky
customer_reviews.text: None of my 3 cats would eat these and one that tried threw up and never would touch again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not much probiotic in it. Cat does eat it though.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. However, I should have looked at the ingredients before I bought it. It has only two probiotics. Everything else is what I would call "filler". I was looking for a chewable. Should have looked around more.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: No way, nope... not my inside or feral babies would not touch! Waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: CARLACAT

customer_reviews.title: Great value for my old cat
customer_reviews.text: Great value for my old cat. She won't eat it after the first day. I'll crush up in her food. She's picky. lol
customer_reviews.author: kim v.

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats with sensitive stomachs and 2 of them LOVE these treats, so overall, they are well worth the money. I will absolutely keep buying these as long as they keep eating them!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Busha

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 cats will eat! That’s a win for me of all the ones I’ve bought these actually got eaten without having to hid powder in food
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Glynn Cipressi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Helps my senior cats tummy troubles. No strong smell when I open the bag, but he still loves them. Must be tasty. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly T

customer_reviews.title: one cat liked it but the cat who needed it didn't
customer_reviews.text: overall, a waste of money for this particular Vetriscience product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for kitties to eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats potatoes, carrots, blueberries, you name it. She will only lick these treats and then walk away. She tried to chew them the first time and immediately spit it out. They are just too dense for cats to chew. Other than that, she licks them and would probably eat them if they were softer.
customer_reviews.author: Maire Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Love vetriscience but...
customer_reviews.text: Love vetriscience and use for several treats but my cats won't eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: ) Nice size, easy to break up
customer_reviews.text: Kitten wont eat them, don't see any results yet but will keep trying. (Our older cat turned up her nose too, but the dog wants to eat them.) Nice size, easy to break up. Cats don't seem to notice them when they're in with food and will eat them then.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Dragoo

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: If my cat even hears me pick this up, he comes running.
customer_reviews.author: nsp99

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these! Hated having to take liquid probiotics.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than mixing up probiotics by emptying pills and mixing with water and having to shake the bottle before every use. In addition, my cat loves them, so that's a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarmox

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic treats that cats love!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great to help my cat be more regular in his intestinal health. Plus the cat loves the taste and acts like these are the best treats ever.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: My fur baby loves these
customer_reviews.text: My cat is picky so I was worried about him eating these... he loves them and begs for more
customer_reviews.author: M Osborne

customer_reviews.title: It is helping
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have a 17 year old cat who is chronically constipated. I had tried everything and was making multiple trips to the vet for extractions. She has been on this for a little over a week and so far has not been constipated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately cats wouldn’t even try them
customer_reviews.text: My cats refused to eat these. So I’m unable to say if they work well. And I have 5 cats so found it odd bit a single 1 would touch these. They’re not real picky
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes them
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes these. He needs probiotic to control regurgitation and these take care of that problem. I haven't had to do any cleanups since he started eating them. Glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Janryn

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat for Cats.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 Persian Cats like this. I cut it in half for easy chewing. I give them one per day each cat.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzy

customer_reviews.title: Help soothe a sensitive tummy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these supplements. He tends to have a sensitive tummy and I’ve seen a noticeable difference since he has been taking these treats daily. I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: He loves the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if it's an added health benefit for my cat (originally purchased because he has constipation issues). I added these to his fiber treats and he really does love them. Just one a day so it's very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of three cats will eat them
customer_reviews.text: Two of my cats love these but the other won’t touch them. They are big so I have to break them up so my cats will eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but these smelled like rotten happy meal. My girls didn't want them. Gave them to my mother and her 5 cats refused.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Hill Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cats won’t touch these
customer_reviews.text: My cats will not eat these. One of my cats will eat ANYTHING and will not touch this probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not good for picky cats
customer_reviews.text: Great product but only 1 out of 3 cats I have will eat then :( the other 2 are picky and they smell them then walk away. Seems to help the 1 cat that is eating them
customer_reviews.author: Kakiraz

product_meta.title: VetriScience Laboratories - Probiotic Everyday for Cats, Digestive Support Supplement, 60 Bite Sized Chews
product_meta.description: A happy cat is most often a cat that has just had its dinner. Stomach upset, diarrhea or uncomfortable gas can all lead to un-happy cat syndrome. VetriScience Probiotic Everyday for Cats is packed with prebiotics and probiotics that support normal GI tract function and digestion. Probiotics can also help to counter stress related digestive upset in day to day situations like traveling and kenneling. With over 100 million CFU of patented, highly stable GanadenBC probiotics per chew, this delicious duck flavored chew offers advanced gastrointestinal and immune support.
feature_bullets: VetriScience Probiotic Everyday for Cats is packed with prebiotics and probiotics that support normal GI tract function and digestion
Probiotic Everyday can help to counter stress related digestive upset in day to day situations like traveling and kenneling or situational upset due to antibiotics, or food related sensitivities
Probiotic Everyday contains 100 million CFU of patented, highly stable GanadenBC probiotics per chew
This delicious duck flavored soft chew offers advanced gastrointestinal and immune support
VetriScience products are manufactured in the U.S.A. and are backed by a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
